subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! 9 Killed In South Carolina Furniture Store Fire
body:
A fire and rescue official in South Carolina says nine bodies have been 
removed from the scene of a fire at a furniture store in Charleston. At 
least two of the dead are firefighters.















Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
